meanings.definition: The art or skill of walking along a tightrope
meanings.sent1: Her funambulisms amazed the audience at the circus.
meanings.sent2: The funambulisms of the performer were truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The clown tried his hand at funambulisms but ended up in a heap on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Balancing work and family life is like performing funambulisms every day.
meanings.sent5: The graceful funambulisms of the dancer left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The funambulisms gracefully crossed the tightrope with ease.
meanings.sent2: The circus featured a talented funambulisms in their show.
meanings.sent3: The funambulisms tripped over their own feet, causing laughter in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Being a parent sometimes feels like being a funambulisms, trying to balance everything.
meanings.sent5: The skilled funambulisms captivated the audience with their daring performance.
